bibl.title: The Gymnosophist Riddle Contest (Berol. P. 13044): A Cynic Text?
bibl.note: P. Berol. Inv. 13044 (= M.-P.3 2068; LDAB 6897). - The riddle contest, which consists of various folk elements with an appropriate historical settings, can be seen as having no particular philosophical allegiance. The wry sense of humour discernible at the end of the scene was probably not that of a Cynic.
BOSMAN Philip R., The Gymnosophist Riddle Contest (Berol. P. 13044): A Cynic Text?
